message_1: A transposition cipher is created by taking every 4th letter of a message and writing it first, then every 5th letter is written second, and so on. If the message is "MATHEMATICSISEASY", what is the ciphertext?
message_2:
To create the ciphertext using the given transposition cipher, we will take every 4th letter first, then every 5th letter, and so on. The message is "MATHEMATICSISEASY".

Every 4th letter: M(1) A(2) T(3) H(4) E(5) M(6) A(7) T(8) I(9) C(10) S(11) I(12) S(13) E(14) A(15) S(16) Y(17)

H(4), C(10), S(16) = HCS

Every 5th letter:

E(5), I(11), Y(17) = EIY

Every 6th letter:

M(6), S(12) = MS

Every 7th letter:

A(7), E(13) = AE

Every 8th letter:

T(8), A(14) = TA

Every 9th letter:

I(9), S(15) = IS

Now, we combine the sequences:

HCS + EIY + MS + AE + TA + IS = HCSEIYMSAETAIS

So, the ciphertext is "HCSEIYMSAETAIS".
